abilities.name: Overpowering Fang
abilities.text: As long as Feraligatr ex is your Active Pokémon, each player's Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex) can't use any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies.

attacks.name: Tsunami
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Sore Spot
attacks.text: Does 70 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.
